name: update-playlist-storage-v2
description: Retrieve and store current playlist payload in a public Cloud Storage bucket
author: Steve Lund <lund5000@gmail.com>

scripts.deploy:dev: gcloud functions deploy updatePlaylistStorageV2 --project chirpradiodev --runtime=nodejs20 --env-vars-file env.dev.yaml --trigger-topic playlist-track-processed --docker-registry=artifact-registry
